trans-unit.source: Represents an extensibility element added to an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Representa um elemento de extensibilidade adicionado a um serviço Web XML.

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, the `ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension` class allows users to define extensibility elements in addition to those defined in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specification.
trans-unit.target: Em uma classe derivada, a `ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension` classe permite que os usuários definam elementos de extensibilidade além daqueles definidos na especificação de WSDL Web Services Description Language ().

trans-unit.source: Extensibility elements can be added to a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> at any of several levels within the class hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Elementos de extensibilidade podem ser adicionados a um <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>em qualquer um dos vários níveis na hierarquia de classe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: Thus many classes derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem> class (including the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> class) have an `Extensions` property, which returns a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, muitas classes derivadas do <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem>classe (incluindo o <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>classe) tem um `Extensions` propriedade, que retorna um <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is used by the import process when the extensibility element is imported.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"> </xref> é usado pelo processo de importação quando o elemento de extensibilidade é importado.

trans-unit.source: A derived class, representing an extensibility element added to an XML Web service, can be attached to a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> by using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.Import%2A> method (which is used by the wsdl.exe tool).
trans-unit.target: Uma classe derivada, que representa um elemento de extensibilidade adicionado a um serviço Web XML, pode ser anexada a um <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>usando o <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.Import%2A>método (que é usado pela ferramenta wsdl.exe).</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.Import%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: You can also use a custom class derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionImporter> class to extend the import process to handle custom extensibility elements.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar uma classe personalizada derivada do <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionImporter>classe para estender o processo de importação para lidar com os elementos de extensibilidade personalizada.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionImporter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is used by the import process; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"> </xref> é usada pelo processo de importação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the class returned by this property will be a derived class within the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description> namespace rather than the base <xref:System.Object> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, a classe retornada por essa propriedade será uma classe derivada dentro de <xref:System.Web.Services.Description>namespace em vez de <xref:System.Object>classe</xref:System.Object> base</xref:System.Web.Services.Description>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is necessary for the action to which it refers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"> </xref> é necessário para a ação à qual se refere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"> </xref> for necessária; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
